function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential dissemination of bogus data and fraudulent information related to COVID-19 testing and reporting.","Impact":"Misinformation can lead to ineffective responses, misguided public health measures, and increased risk of disease spread.","Mitigation":"Implement blockchain-based applications with consensus algorithms and smart contracts to minimize the potential dissemination of bogus data and fraudulent information.","Technologies":"Blockchain technology with consensus algorithms and smart contracts.","People":"Public health organizations, testing facilities, healthcare personnel, and general public.","Owner":"Public health organizations, technology companies."}]}
